definition: broken/damaged/worn out/lousy/rotten/to break, split or cleave/to get rid of/to destroy/to break with/to defeat/to capture (a city etc)/to expose the truth of
bad/spoiled/broken/to break down/(suffix) to the utmost

pinyin: bao3 zheng4 po4 huai4 zhan4 lu:e4

sentences.english: The reaction of ozone destruction is the chain reaction.
sentences.chinese: 破坏臭氧的反应是链反应。

sentences.english: VOICE: So it sounds as if anabolic steroids can be very destructive.
sentences.chinese: 所以，听起来合成代谢类固醇的破坏性会很大。

sentences.english: In other words, it wreaks havoc on our memory.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，它对我们的记忆力造成了严重的破坏。

sentences.english: With more forests being destoryed, huge quantities of good earth are washed away each year.
sentences.chinese: 由于更多森林被破坏，每年有大量的好土壤流失掉了。

sentences.english: As time gose by, man is making the earth sike .
sentences.chinese: 随着时间的推移，人类正在令地球受到破坏。

sentences.english: The 1961 law forbidding dowries further undermined traditional Hinduism.
sentences.chinese: 1961年，法律更进一步地破坏印度教传统的嫁妆。

sentences.english: Father and son unexpectedly found that jiang yuan birth mothers tomb was destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 父子二人发现蒋元生母的墓碑竟遭人破坏。

sentences.english: These results suggest that pathway which cancer cells entered lymphatics was mainly by destructing walls of lymphatics.
sentences.chinese: 提示癌细胞进入淋巴管的途径以破坏管壁为主。

sentences.english: Vitamin C is destroyed when overheated.
sentences.chinese: 维生素C受热过度就会被破坏。

sentences.english: Love is a great wrecker of peace of mind.
sentences.chinese: 爱情对平和心境有强大破坏力。

sentences.english: Some government officials speuak in favour of the company that destroyed the earth.
sentences.chinese: 有些政府官员为那家破坏地球的公司帮腔。

sentences.english: Dogs are not allowed to bring into parks, for they may destroy the flowers in it.
sentences.chinese: 由于狗可能会破坏花木，所以不允许把狗带进公园。

sentences.english: Either way, it’s really destructive to talk only about the dangers of sex.
sentences.chinese: 总之只跟孩子谈性的危险是极具破坏性的。

sentences.english: China could also clean up environmental damage caused by underpricing resources.
sentences.chinese: 中国也可以治理由于资源定价过低造成的环境破坏。

sentences.english: All of these approaches can be subverted.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些方法都能够被攻击者破坏。

sentences.english: Associate yourselves, O ye people, and ye shall be broken in pieces;
sentences.chinese: 列国的人民哪，任凭你们喧囔，终必破坏。

definition: to clear away/to eliminate/to get rid of
